column5: Just got back from the Facts of Fishing tour held in Sarnia tonight,  it is definitely worth checking out.  Picked up a tonne of great tips and all of the presenters were quite knowledgable.  Dave and his co presenters were giving out a bit of swag as well... and getting the kids in the crowd involved.  If you can get to one of these shows, you won't be dissapointed!!
Sarnia was great, looking forward to London tomorrow!
I really wish I could go, I know it's going to be a great show...  Maureen

We were not happy about missing this year my daughter is bummed out but with working later shifts I dont get back in time to get out to the shows. Hope everyone has a blast at them I know we did last year and hope to be at the next round of them.  Cheers Mike
I'm going to show up on Wednesday and recognize a wackload of people I've never met before.  Kinda funny
